title: Gestures Detection (CAPSENSE)
description: CAPSENSE-based gestures detection model detects up, down, left and right gestures
long_description: The project uses capacitive sensing (CAPSENSE™) technology to interpret gesture patterns and improve user interface interactions. A supervised learning model is trained on touch-based sensor data to accurately classify the following swipes: up, down, left, right
